commit.message:
adaint.h, adaint.c (__gnat_open): Added.

2014-08-01  Pascal Obry  <obry@adacore.com>

	* adaint.h, adaint.c (__gnat_open): Added.
	* s-crtl.ads (open): Import __gnat_open for large file support.

From-SVN: r213411
